title: Log doesn't have color in dev mode
body:
### Describe the bug

Log on console appears only in white color

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/405347/84b7b755-f3ab-4b84-9c49-1492045e635a)


### Expected behavior

Colorful logs when running in dev mode (quarkus:dev). 

### Actual behavior

White log. Maven appears colorful. Quarkus app is the sad one.

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/405347/a89e9c5c-0f15-4c15-8642-bdb8c7929425)


### How to Reproduce?

Brand new Quarkus app (default) from https://code.quarkus.io/

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.8.1"

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.5.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.5

### Additional information

`%dev.quarkus.log.console.color=true` is a workaround, but with a deprecation warning (would be nice to have a hint of the new property).
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/405347/d5062fee-b353-47d2-a829-8b18208155c3)

`%dev.quarkus.console.color=true` is the valid workaround but shouldn't be necessary
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/405347/e1babbc8-bc0d-4692-a01a-ce363b95b88b)
